ARTICLE.TITLE: News, Sports, Jobs - Salem News
ARTICLE.TEXT:
Sebring BOE to meet

SEBRING- The Sebring Local School District Board of Education will hold its August regular board meeting at 6 p.m. Monday via Zoom at https://zoom.us/j/99017897152.

SPL to host book talk

SALEM- The Salem Public Library will host a book discussion of Christine Mangan’s “Tangerine” from 7 to 8 p.m. via Zoom. Registration is required at http://www.salem.lib.oh.us or by calling the library at 330-332-0042 for registration assistance. A connection link to Zoom will be provided via email prior to the program. Check with the library for book availability.

Online comedy offered

LISBON- Stage Left Players will present Don Zolidis’ online comedy “10 Ways to Survive Life in a Quarantine” for 24 hours beginning at 7 p.m. Saturday. Jodine Pilmer and Kandy Cleland host the event where the quirky cast of 21 players, four dogs and one cat will share their isolation survival advice.

The doors to the Trinity Playhouse in Lisbon have been closed to public performances since mid-March. Since that time, the non-profit Stage Left Players have worked creatively to fulfill their vision to inspire, transform and connect people through community theatre- at a socially safe distance.

“Junior board member Kaleigh Ceci offered to direct, organize and produce this online comedy as a fundraiser for us. Who would say ‘no’ to that,” Cleland explained. “Kaleigh reached out to Stage Left alumni living in NYC and Pittsburgh as well as SLP regulars who embraced the opportunity to collaborate on the project.”

Cleland continues to be amazed and grateful for the support of actors and patrons who remain determined to keep Stage Left going.

“The doors are closed, but the bills still need to be paid. Online or on stage we can still make people smile,” she said.

Tickets to the online comedy may be purchased by going to StageLeftPlayers.org. Every online ticket purchase will help the Trinity Playhouse meet operating expenses while doors are closed to the public due to the Covid 19 pandemic.

“10 Ways to Survive Life in a Quarantine” by Don Zolidis is presented in agreement with Playscripts Inc. as prepared for Richard Ceci.
